column1: The '''Water-valley''' was a gentle valley in [[the Shire]].
The Water-valley was the valley of [[the Water]].<ref>{{HM|RC}}
column2: p. 99</ref> The [[East Road]] was constructed in the wide valley
column5: [[Frogmorton]] and [[Whitfurrows]] were located in it.<ref>{{FR|Part}}</ref> [[Bilbo Baggins]] took [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] for many a long walk through the valley.<ref>{{FR|Three}}</ref>
